message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to enhance your daily life. This unique item is valued at $100 by me, reflecting its high-quality craftsmanship and functionality. I believe it could significantly benefit you, and I'm eager to see it find the right home where it can truly shine. Let's discuss how we can make this happen.

I'm interested in the product, but $100 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $60. I'm willing to pay a premium for quality, but I'm on a budget. Can we meet in the middle at $70?
